review: I love this! I'm so happy that I can watch from my Amazon video library on my TV instead of my computer. I was an easy set up! I can even subscribe to Netflix if I choose. Haven't streamed from HULU yet...but so many options! I definately want to purchase one for the downstairs TV.
author: Sassywahine2003

review: Works great and easy to install and set up.
author: Jane Doe

review: It is awesome.  Don't know why you would pay more for the bigger box.  I also have a Chrome Cast and I world recommend the stick over it.  The remote is nicer than using your phone or tablet to control the Chrome Cast.  The stick is also easier to travel with.  The Chrome cast would not hook up to my phone's hotspot for some reason but the Fire stick worked flawlessly.  I have heard other people recommend the Roku (I have not tried it) but being a prime member I think this is the best fit for me.
author: John

review: I have an Apple TV2 as well. We rarely use it anymore. The content available from Amazon Prime is good.Much less buffering than on Apple TV. An incredible bargain. Makes me that much closer to cutting the cable cord and only keeping Internet.
author: Spencer

review: I've really been disappointed with Netflix- nothing I ever want to watch is available! A friend suggested I try Amazon and I love it. Almost everything I've queried has been available for streaming. I also really enjoy their web series Catastrophe.
author: Jim M "Kip 7"

review: I travel often for work and this thing is a life saver when you're bored in a hotel room!
author: archetype52

review: Already a Prime member with a wireless router, the setup was very easy, simply plug it in, set the input to the correct option and follow directions.  The grandkids use it regularly when they visit.  The content availability is a broad selection of music, TV shows, and movies.  Recommend to anyone looking for a viewing alternative.
author: mirenburg

review: Love it. The only reason for not giving it 5 stars is the lack of useful instructional material for navigating with the remote.
author: Paul Sandifer

review: Easy to set up, and I have no tech skills. User friendly, great picture and sound quality. Very happy with my purchase!
author: Carol Marner
